About Us

Built by Practitioners, Not Theorists

RankFlow was founded by SEO practitioners who spent years in the trenches, saw the gap between vanity metrics and real business results, and decided to fix it.

Our Story

In 2019, our founders were running SEO for some of the fastest-growing SaaS companies in Europe. They kept running into the same problem: agencies that chased rankings and traffic without caring whether any of it turned into revenue.

So they started RankFlow with a simple premise -- every SEO initiative should connect directly to a business outcome. No fluff reports. No vanity metrics. Just strategies that move the needle on revenue.

Today, we serve over 200 clients across 14 countries, from early-stage startups to publicly traded companies. Our team of 35+ specialists combines deep technical expertise with genuine business acumen.

Our Values

What Drives Us Every Day

Revenue Over Rankings

Rankings are a means, not an end. We measure success by the revenue and leads we drive for your business, not just where you rank.

Radical Transparency

No black-box strategies. You get real-time access to everything we do, every decision we make, and every result we achieve.

Continuous Innovation

Search evolves daily. We stay ahead by investing heavily in R&D, testing new approaches, and embracing AI and automation.

Frequently Asked Questions

Our team of 35+ specialists has a combined 100+ years of experience in SEO, content strategy, and digital marketing. Our founders have been in the industry since 2012, and every team member brings at least 5 years of hands-on SEO experience across multiple industries.

We take a revenue-first approach to SEO. Every strategy we build connects directly to business outcomes -- not just rankings or traffic. We combine deep technical expertise, data-driven content strategy, and AI-powered optimization to deliver measurable results that impact your bottom line.

No reputable SEO agency can guarantee specific rankings because search algorithms are controlled by Google. What we do guarantee is a transparent, data-driven process, regular reporting on measurable KPIs, and a relentless focus on driving revenue growth through organic search.

We use an enterprise-grade tech stack including Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, Google Search Console, and proprietary AI tools we've built in-house. Our custom dashboards give you real-time visibility into every aspect of your SEO performance.

We invest heavily in R&D and continuously test new approaches across our client portfolio. Our team monitors algorithm changes in real-time, participates in industry research groups, and attends major search conferences. We also run controlled experiments to validate strategies before rolling them out at scale.

Want to Work With Us?

Whether you're exploring partnership or looking for a career in search marketing, we'd love to hear from you.
